text: 20.35 Mat 10.8, 2 Ko 11.9, 11.12, Epe 4.28, 1 Te 4.11, 2 Te 3.8 Pen gɨpin anɨb ak tek, nɨbi abe kɨles gɨl binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop gɨtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Bɨawl chɨn Jisas, takaw agak ak nepɨm agak. Ne agak, Bɨ ogɨnap nɨbop tap ñenɨgabal, nɨbi mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabɨm ak pen, nɨbi binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop tap ñenɨgabɨm, mɨñmɨñ awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabɨm agak.
